New Records: Lionel Messi set the record for the most minutes played in Copa América history during the match.
Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez scored his first goal for Argentina with a header in the 34th minute.
Enner Valencia missed a penalty kick for Ecuador, hitting the post.
Kevin Rodríguez scored a stoppage-time goal for Ecuador to force penalty kicks.
Argentina won the penalty shootout 4-2 to advance to the semifinals.
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina is making a strong case to defend its title after a win over a tough Ecuador team.
Argentina will face the winner of Canada vs. Venezuela in the semifinals.
